Title: AKA Ladies Night
Writer: Brian Michael Bendis (based on the character from the Marvel comics by), Michael Gaydos (based on the character from the Marvel comics by), Melissa Rosenberg (created by), Melissa Rosenberg
Actors: Krysten Ritter, Mike Colter, Rachael Taylor, Erin Moriarty
Plot: Jessica Jones is hired to find an NYU student athlete who's vanished, but it turns out to be more than a simple missing persons case.
